Byte array representation of the Bit Torrent protocol handshake header

PIECE_HEADER_SIZE - Static variable in class btClient.BtUtils
The number of bytes that comprise the header for a Piece message in the BitTorrent Protocol

piece_index - Variable in class btClient.Block
The zero based index of the piece that this block belongs too
piece_length - Variable in class btClient.TorrentInfo
The default length of each piece in bytes.  Note that the last piece may be irregularly-sized (less than the value of piece_length) if the file size is not a multiple of the piece size.
PIECE_LENGTH_PREFIX - Static variable in class btClient.BtUtils
